name: Bladed Fury
overview: Set out to uncover the truth... Fluid combat – The combo and hack’n slash style gameplay makes combat more exciting and difficult to master. Unique story and art style – Bladed Fury brings players an addictive action game experience with Chinese traditional art and sound design. Challenge mode – An unlockable challenge mode will test your combat and survival skills in the end. Make sure you’ve nearly perfected your combo ability!
